Title: Provides that provisions in construction contracts with respect to requirements for certain additional insurance coverage are void and unenforceable
Summary: Provides that provisions in construction contracts with respect to requirements for certain additional insurance coverage are void and unenforceable.
LawCode: Amd ยง5-322.1, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to the invalidity of additional insurance provisions
